description:
Kiri leads a team of heroes trying to slow down the Chaosification of the remaining worlds. Meanwhile, Gao and his friends search for Chibi Panda, and Kanata faces Sakate in a Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Plan Activated! New World Chaos!
Saishuu Keikaku Shidou! Chaos Suru Sekai!!
最終計画始動! カオス化する世界!!
